article.title: McMaster Assigned to Army Capabilities Integration Center

tags.tag: U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command

article.text: Maj. Gen. Herbert R. McMaster Jr., USA, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as deputy commanding general, futures/director, Army Capabilities Integration Center, U.S. Army Training and Doctrine Command, Joint Base Langley-Eustis, Virginia. Â
